fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka devnet-5 successful; BPO schedule finalized for testnets
Holesky fork next week, BPO1 week after, BPO2 following week
Shadow fork for Holesky planned Friday after Thursday releases

client_updates.highlight: Nethermind gas mismatch bug under investigation on devnet-3
Erigon node experiencing slow database commits; investigating disk issues
Geth updated ModEx library and switched to GNARC for BN256; ready for 60M

testing_progress.highlight: XEN contract gas testing at 45M/60M/100M using Nethermind benchmark tool
Block-level access list breakout Wednesday 2PM UTC; discussing hash vs trie
EPBS spec V beta.0 release in 24 hours; targets DevNet 0

gas_limit_discussion.highlight: Sepolia and Holesky already at 60M gas; mainnet increase pending Besu decision
Besu team split on 60M; new arithmetic optimizations risky close to Fusaka
Besu at 15 MGAS/s on EEST tests; 60M blocks process in 3.5s
Worst case: Besu nodes miss attestations during sustained attack; not consensus-breaking

action_items.action: Decide on 60M gas limit for mainnet by end of week
Approve mainnet Osaka-style blob schedule PR for shadow fork
Share GP hacked image source code for gas benchmark testing

decisions.decision: Code freeze target end of today; client releases by Thursday
Gas limit increase decision deferred to Thursday ACD after XEN test results

targets.target: Holesky Fusaka fork next week; BPO1 one week later; BPO2 week after
Wednesday 2PM UTC - Block-level access list breakout call
24 hours - EPBS spec V beta.0 release
